posts.post_content:
With [Leyline of Punishment](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Leyline of Punishment) on the board, deathtouch would indeed kill Magic's favorite uncle.  
Anyway, why does [Nicol Bolas](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nicol Bolas) get a planeswalker card but not Uncle Istvan? Bolas is some lame dragon. But Uncle Istvan is Uncle-freakin'-Istvan! Abilities: +1: You win the game!
posts.html:

..It would be pretty sweet to see him again in Innistrad.

Why can't we have more cards like this?
